bibdata.title: IEEE Recommended Practice for Common Framework of Location Services for Healthcare
IEEE Recommended Practice for Common Framework of Location Services for Healthcare

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: A common framework of Location Services for Healthcare (LS-H) is contained in this recommended practice. The framework includes LS-H conceptual information model and LS-H common terminology.
A common framework of Location Services for Healthcare (LS-H) is contained in this recommended practice. The framework includes LS-H conceptual information model and LS-H common terminology.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
